member_organisations: Full Fact is not a membership organisation.
fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Full Fact has engaged with the European Commission's Multi-Stakeholder Conference on fake news on 13th and 14th November and is applying to be part of the High Level Group. We will be submitting evidence to the consultation.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Full Fact is a member of the National Council of Voluntary Organisations in the UK.
goals__remit: Full Fact is the UK's independent and non-partisan factchecking charity. Our aim is to promote well-informed public debate. We do this by factchecking claims made by politicians and the media and providing high quality information to a public audience directly on our site, via the media and on social media.
relevant_communication: Full Fact rarely works directly with the EU institutions. However we are engaging with the European Commission workstream on Fake News and will be submitting evidence to the public consultation as well as appying to be a member of the High Level Group. We also participated in the European Commission's Multi-Stakeholder Conference on fake news on 13th and 14th November 2017.
